attires.name: Jhumka
attires.description: Traditional bell-shaped earrings, often ornate and dangling, worn by Indian women for festive occasions.

attires.name: Bali
attires.description: Hoop earrings, popular in many regions of India, worn by both men and women.

attires.name: Kaanphool
attires.description: Floral-shaped ear ornaments, often covering the entire ear, popular in Rajasthan and among classical dancers.

attires.name: Kundal
attires.description: Traditional circular or spiral earrings, worn in rural and tribal communities.

attires.name: Latkan
attires.description: Dangling earring attachments, often paired with other earrings for added ornamentation.
